title: need help with this Impact-looking typeface
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010182155im_/http:/typophile.com/files/EKtitle_4961.jpg)

This typeface looks like Impact, but isn’t quite. It was used on this 1977 series, and I believe it matches a typeface used on the Kovacs shows from 1961. What is this?

Thanks!!

 [‹ Boston Red Sox](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010182155/http:/typophile.com/node/50257 "Go to previous forum topic") [spikey type ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010182155/http:/typophile.com/node/50363 "Go to next forum topic")
author: silentcinema

comments.content: Brett is right. This is probably a pre-digital [Franklin Gothic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081010182155/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/franklin_gothic_std_extra_condensed/?sample_text=The%20Best%20of%20Ernie%20Kovacs&sample_size=48).
